verses.verse: בָּעֵ֣ת <WH6256> At that time הַהִ֣יא <WH1931> he נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֡ה <WH3068> the LORD [וְיֹצִיאוּ כ] (יֹוצִ֣יאוּ <WH3318> after ק) אֶת־ <WH853> עַצְמ֣וֹת <WH6106> the bones מַלְכֵֽי־ <WH4428> of the kings יְהוּדָ֣ה <WH3063> of Judah וְאֶת־ <WH853> עַצְמוֹת־ <WH6106> and the bones שָׂרָיו֩ <WH8269> of his princes וְאֶת־ <WH853> עַצְמ֨וֹת <WH6106> and the bones הַכֹּהֲנִ֜ים <WH3548> of the priests וְאֵ֣ת ׀ <WH853> עַצְמ֣וֹת <WH6106> and the bones הַנְּבִיאִ֗ים <WH5030> of the prophets וְאֵ֛ת <WH853> עַצְמ֥וֹת <WH6106> and the bones יוֹשְׁבֵֽי־ <WH3427> of the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִָ֖ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem מִקִּבְרֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH6913> out of their graves

וּשְׁטָחוּם֩ <WH7849> And they shall spread לַשֶּׁ֨מֶשׁ <WH8121> them before the sun וְלַיָּרֵ֜חַ <WH3394> and the moon וּלְכֹ֣ל ׀ <WH3605> all צְבָ֣א <WH6635> and all the host הַשָּׁמַ֗יִם <WH8064> of heaven אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which אֲהֵב֜וּם <WH157> whom they have loved וַאֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> and which עֲבָדוּם֙ <WH5647> and whom they have served וַֽאֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> and which הָלְכ֣וּ <WH1980> whom they have walked אַֽחֲרֵיהֶ֔ם <WH310> and after וַאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> and which דְּרָשׁ֔וּם <WH1875> and whom they have sought וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> and which הִֽשְׁתַּחֲו֖וּ <WH7812> and whom they have worshipped לָהֶ֑ם לֹ֤א <WH3808> not יֵאָֽסְפוּ֙ <WH622> they shall not be gathered וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> or יִקָּבֵ֔רוּ <WH6912> nor be buried לְדֹ֛מֶן <WH1828> they shall be for dung עַל־ <WH5921> on פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> upon the face הָאֲדָמָ֖ה <WH127> of the earth יִֽהְיֽוּ׃ <WH1961> become

וְנִבְחַ֥ר <WH977> shall be chosen מָ֙וֶת֙ <WH4194> And death מֵֽחַיִּ֔ים <WH2416> rather than life לְכֹ֗ל <WH3605> all הַשְּׁאֵרִית֙ <WH7611> by all the residue הַנִּשְׁאָרִ֔ים <WH7604> of them that remain מִן־ <WH4480> rather הַמִּשְׁפָּחָ֥ה <WH4940> family הָֽרָעָ֖ה <WH7451> of this evil הַזֹּ֑את <WH2063> in בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all הַמְּקֹמ֤וֹת <WH4725> in all the places הַנִּשְׁאָרִים֙ <WH7604> which remain אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> to which הִדַּחְתִּ֣ים <WH5080> whither I have driven שָׁ֔ם <WH8033> them נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> them saith יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <WH6635> of hosts ס

וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <WH559> Moreover thou shalt say אֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <WH413> to כֹּ֚ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> unto them Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD הֲיִפְּל֖וּ <WH5307> Shall they fall וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> and not יָק֑וּמוּ <WH6965> and not arise אִם־ <WH518> lo יָשׁ֖וּב <WH7725> ? shall he turn away וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not יָשֽׁוּב׃ <WH7725> and not return

מַדּ֨וּעַ <WH4069> Why שׁוֹבְבָ֜ה <WH7725> slidden back הָעָ֥ם <WH5971> Why [then] is this people הַזֶּ֛ה <WH2088> has this יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem מְשֻׁבָ֣ה <WH4878> backsliding נִצַּ֑חַת <WH5331> alway הֶחֱזִ֙יקוּ֙ <WH2388> fast בַּתַּרְמִ֔ית <WH8649> fast deceit מֵאֲנ֖וּ <WH3985> they refuse לָשֽׁוּב׃ <WH7725> to return

הִקְשַׁ֤בְתִּי <WH7181> I hearkened וָֽאֶשְׁמָע֙ <WH8085> and heard לוֹא־ <WH3808> not כֵ֣ן <WH3651> after that יְדַבֵּ֔רוּ <WH1696> [but] they spake not aright אֵ֣ין <WH369> No אִ֗ישׁ <WH376> no man נִחָם֙ <WH5162> repented עַל־ <WH5921> him of רָ֣עָת֔וֹ <WH7451> his wickedness לֵאמֹ֖ר <WH559> saying מֶ֣ה <WH4100> What עָשִׂ֑יתִי <WH6213> What have I done כֻּלֹּ֗ה <WH3605> all manner שָׁ֚ב <WH7725> ? every one turned [בִּמְרֻצֹותָם כ] (בִּמְר֣וּצָתָ֔ם <WH4794> course ק) כְּס֥וּס <WH5483> as the horse שׁוֹטֵ֖ף <WH7857> rusheth בַּמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <WH4421> into the battle

גַּם־ <WH1571> Even חֲסִידָ֣ה <WH2624> Yea the stork בַשָּׁמַ֗יִם <WH8064> in the heaven יָֽדְעָה֙ <WH3045> knoweth מֽוֹעֲדֶ֔יהָ <WH4150> her appointed times וְתֹ֤ר <WH8449> and the turtle [וְסוּס כ] (וְסִיס֙ <WH5483> crane ק) וְעָג֔וּר <WH5693> and the swallow שָׁמְר֖וּ <WH8104> observe אֶת־ <WH853> עֵ֣ת <WH6256> the time בֹּאָ֑נָה <WH935> of their coming וְעַמִּ֕י <WH5971> but my people לֹ֣א <WH3808> not יָֽדְע֔וּ <WH3045> know אֵ֖ת <WH853> מִשְׁפַּ֥ט <WH4941> not the judgment יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

אֵיכָ֤ה <WH349> how תֹֽאמְרוּ֙ <WH559> How do ye say חֲכָמִ֣ים <WH2450> We [are] wise אֲנַ֔חְנוּ <WH587> we וְתוֹרַ֥ת <WH8451> and the law יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אִתָּ֑נוּ <WH854> for אָכֵן֙ <WH403> [is] with us? Lo certainly הִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> behold לַשֶּׁ֣קֶר <WH8267> in vain עָשָׂ֔ה <WH6213> made עֵ֖ט <WH5842> he [it] the pen שֶׁ֥קֶר <WH8267> [is] in vain סֹפְרִֽים׃ <WH5608> of the scribes

הֹבִ֣ישׁוּ <WH954> are put חֲכָמִ֔ים <WH2450> The wise חַ֖תּוּ <WH2865> they are dismayed וַיִּלָּכֵ֑דוּ <WH3920> and taken הִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> Behold בִדְבַר־ <WH1697> the word יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD מָאָ֔סוּ <WH3988> lo they have rejected וְחָכְמַֽת־ <WH2451> and what wisdom מֶ֖ה <WH4100> and what לָהֶֽם׃ ס

לָכֵן֩ <WH3651> Therefore אֶתֵּ֨ן <WH5414> Therefore will I give אֶת־ <WH853> נְשֵׁיהֶ֜ם <WH802> their wives לַאֲחֵרִ֗ים <WH312> unto others שְׂדֽוֹתֵיהֶם֙ <WH7704> [and] their fields לְי֣וֹרְשִׁ֔ים <WH3423> to them that shall inherit כִּ֤י <WH3588> Because מִקָּטֹן֙ <WH6996> [them] for every one from the least וְעַד־ <WH5704> even גָּד֔וֹל <WH1419> even unto the greatest כֻּלֹּ֖ה <WH3605> Everyone בֹּצֵ֣עַ <WH1214> is given בָּ֑צַע <WH1215> to covetousness מִנָּבִיא֙ <WH5030> from the prophet וְעַד־ <WH5704> even כֹּהֵ֔ן <WH3548> even unto the priest כֻּלֹּ֖ה <WH3605> Everyone עֹ֥שֶׂה <WH6213> every one dealeth שָּֽׁקֶר׃ <WH8267> falsely

וַיְרַפּ֞וּ <WH7495> For they have healed אֶת־ <WH853> שֶׁ֤בֶר <WH7667> the hurt בַּת־ <WH1323> of the daughter עַמִּי֙ <WH5971> of my people עַל־ <WH5921> and נְקַלָּ֔ה <WH7043> slightly לֵאמֹ֖ר <WH559> saying שָׁל֣וֹם ׀ <WH7965> Peace שָׁל֑וֹם <WH7965> peace וְאֵ֖ין <WH369> is no שָׁלֽוֹם׃ <WH7965> when [there is] no peace

הֹבִ֕שׁוּ <WH3001> Were they ashamed כִּ֥י <WH3588> because תוֹעֵבָ֖ה <WH8441> of the abomination עָשׂ֑וּ <WH6213> when they had committed גַּם־ <WH1571> were they בּ֣וֹשׁ <WH954> ashamed לֹֽא־ <WH3808> were not יֵבֹ֗שׁוּ <WH954> ashamed וְהִכָּלֵם֙ <WH3637> they blush לֹ֣א <WH3808> did not יָדָ֔עוּ <WH3045> neither could לָכֵ֞ן <WH3651> Therefore יִפְּל֣וּ <WH5307> therefore shall they fall בַנֹּפְלִ֗ים <WH5307> among them that fall בְּעֵ֧ת <WH6256> in the time פְּקֻדָּתָ֛ם <WH6486> of their visitation יִכָּשְׁל֖וּ <WH3782> they shall be cast down אָמַ֥ר <WH559> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD ס

אָסֹ֥ף <WH622> I will surely אֲסִיפֵ֖ם <WH5486> consume נְאֻם־ <WH5002> them saith יְהֹוָ֑ה <WH3069> God אֵין֩ <WH369> There עֲנָבִ֨ים <WH6025> [there shall be] no grapes בַּגֶּ֜פֶן <WH1612> on the vine וְאֵ֧ין <WH369> will be no תְּאֵנִ֣ים <WH8384> nor figs בַּתְּאֵנָ֗ה <WH8384> on the fig tree וְהֶֽעָלֶה֙ <WH5929> and the leaf נָבֵ֔ל <WH5034> shall fade וָאֶתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> and [the things that] I have given לָהֶ֖ם <WH1992> them יַעַבְרֽוּם׃ <WH5674> them shall pass away

עַל־ <WH5921> and מָה֙ <WH4100> how long אֲנַ֣חְנוּ <WH587> we יֹֽשְׁבִ֔ים <WH3427> Why do we sit still הֵֽאָסְפ֗וּ <WH622> ? assemble וְנָב֛וֹא <WH935> yourselves and let us enter אֶל־ <WH413> about עָרֵ֥י <WH5892> cities הַמִּבְצָ֖ר <WH4013> into the defenced וְנִדְּמָה־ <WH1826> and let us be silent שָּׁ֑ם <WH8033> there כִּי֩ <WH3588> Because יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> there for the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֤ינוּ <WH430> our God הֲדִמָּ֙נוּ֙ <WH1826> hath put us to silence וַיַּשְׁקֵ֣נוּ <WH8248> to drink מֵי־ <WH4325> and given us water רֹ֔אשׁ <WH7219> of gall כִּ֥י <WH3588> Because חָטָ֖אנוּ <WH2398> because we have sinned לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> against the LORD

קַוֵּ֥ה <WH6960> We looked לְשָׁל֖וֹם <WH7965> for peace וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> no ט֑וֹב <WH2896> but no good לְעֵ֥ת <WH6256> [came and] for a time מַרְפֵּ֖ה <WH4832> of health וְהִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> behold בְעָתָֽה׃ <WH1205> and behold trouble

מִדָּ֤ן <WH1835> from Dan נִשְׁמַע֙ <WH8085> was heard נַחְרַ֣ת <WH5170> The snorting סוּסָ֗יו <WH5483> of his horses מִקּוֹל֙ <WH6963> at the sound מִצְהֲל֣וֹת <WH4684> of the neighing אַבִּירָ֔יו <WH47> of his strong ones רָעֲשָׁ֖ה <WH7493> trembled כָּל־ <WH3605> the whole הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> the whole land וַיָּב֗וֹאוּ <WH935> for they are come וַיֹּֽאכְלוּ֙ <WH398> and have devoured אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> the land וּמְלוֹאָ֔הּ <WH4393> and all עִ֖יר <WH5892> that is in it the city וְיֹ֥שְׁבֵי <WH3427> and those that dwell בָֽהּ׃ ס

כִּי֩ <WH3588> for הִנְנִ֨י <WH2005> behold מְשַׁלֵּ֜חַ <WH7971> For behold I will send בָּכֶ֗ם נְחָשִׁים֙ <WH5175> serpents צִפְעֹנִ֔ים <WH6848> cockatrices אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which אֵין־ <WH369> there לָהֶ֖ם לָ֑חַשׁ <WH3908> among you which [will] not [be] charmed וְנִשְּׁכ֥וּ <WH5391> and they shall bite אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> נְאֻם־ <WH5002> you saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD ס
מַבְלִ֥יגִיתִ֖י <WH4010> [When] I would comfort עֲלֵ֣י <WH5921> and יָג֑וֹן <WH3015> myself against sorrow עָלַ֖י <WH5921> and לִבִּ֥י <WH3820> my heart דַוָּֽי׃ <WH1742> [is] faint

הִנֵּה־ <WH2009> Behold ק֞וֹל <WH6963> Behold the voice שַֽׁוְעַ֣ת <WH7775> of the cry בַּת־ <WH1323> of the daughter עַמִּ֗י <WH5971> of my people מֵאֶ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> country מַרְחַקִּ֔ים <WH4801> because of them that dwell in a far הַֽיהוָה֙ <WH3068> [Is] not the LORD אֵ֣ין <WH369> else בְּצִיּ֔וֹן <WH6726> Zion אִם־ <WH518> lo מַלְכָּ֖הּ <WH4428> king אֵ֣ין <WH369> else בָּ֑הּ מַדּ֗וּעַ <WH4069> Why הִכְעִס֛וּנִי <WH3707> in her? Why have they provoked me to anger בִּפְסִלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH6456> with their graven images בְּהַבְלֵ֥י <WH1892> altogether נֵכָֽר׃ <WH5236> [and] with strange

עָבַ֥ר <WH5674> is past קָצִ֖יר <WH7105> The harvest כָּ֣לָה <WH3615> is ended קָ֑יִץ <WH7019> the summer וַאֲנַ֖חְנוּ <WH587> ourselves ל֥וֹא <WH3808> are not נוֹשָֽׁעְנוּ׃ <WH3467> and we are not saved

עַל־ <WH5921> For שֶׁ֥בֶר <WH7667> For the hurt בַּת־ <WH1323> of the daughter עַמִּ֖י <WH5971> of my people הָשְׁבָּ֑רְתִּי <WH7665> am I hurt קָדַ֕רְתִּי <WH6937> I am black שַׁמָּ֖ה <WH8047> astonishment הֶחֱזִקָֽתְנִי׃ <WH2388> hath taken hold

הַצֳרִי֙ <WH6875> [Is there] no balm אֵ֣ין <WH369> is there בְּגִלְעָ֔ד <WH1568> in Gilead אִם־ <WH518> lo רֹפֵ֖א <WH7495> [is there] no physician אֵ֣ין <WH369> no שָׁ֑ם <WH8033> in it כִּ֗י <WH3588> there? why then מַדּ֙וּעַ֙ <WH4069> how לֹ֣א <WH3808> not עָֽלְתָ֔ה <WH5927> recovered אֲרֻכַ֖ת <WH724> is not the health בַּת־ <WH1323> of the daughter עַמִּֽי׃ <WH5971> of my people
